name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Tab Group - Tab/Tab Group Manager
name.fr: One Tab Group - Le Gestionnaire d'Onglets/Groupe d'Onglets

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your all-in-one tab/tab group manager that helps you effectively manage and organize your tabs/tab groups
short.fr: Le Gestionnaire d'Onglets/Groupe d'Onglets multifonctionnel,il peut vous aider Ã  gÃ©rer et organiser les Onglets/Groupe d'Ongletsâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One Tab Group is a Chrome extension alternative to OneTab/Session Buddy, that allows you to manage your tabs & tab groups in one place. One click to aggregate all tabs & tab groups into one session.

âœ¨ Features

- âš¡ï¸ Organise tabs & tab groups efficiently
- ğŸ–¼ï¸ Master Your Open Windows
  - âœ¨ See all your open windows at a glance
  - ğŸ’¾ Save tabs into sessions for later access
- ğŸ—‚ï¸ Save/Restore/Reorganise tabs, even tab groups
  - in the current window
  - in a new window
  - restore and suspend tabs to save memory
- ğŸ”„ Synchronizes your browser tabs & tab groups
- ğŸ¤ Reorganize tab sessions use Drag & Drop with ease
- âŒ¨ï¸ Command `K` Interface - easily explore the all tabs & tab groups.
- ğŸ·ï¸ Visual Web Bookmark - Turn a link into a visual web bookmark with a beautiful QRCode, that you can share with others.

- ğŸ”² Single Column View | Double Columns View | Timeline View
- ğŸŒ› Dark Mode Support
- ğŸŒ i18n Support

- ğŸ’¾ Session Backup Solution
  - ğŸ“‘ Save your session as a JSON file
  - ğŸ“§ Send your session to your email (Sign-in)

- ğŸ“¥ Support migrating solution
  - ğŸ”– Support for migrating tabs data from `OneTab` to `One Tab Group`
  - ğŸ”– Support for migrating tabs data from `SessionBuddy` to `One Tab Group`

- ğŸ” Search all tabs quickly using fuzzy search
- ğŸ§¹ Suspend open tabs to save memory
- â˜ï¸ Auto Cloud Sync with Sign in
- â¤ï¸ Bookmark your favorite sessions
- âœ¨ Share Sessions as a link with anyone
